name: simply-fetch
description: Fetch wrapper to simplify the interface, the output, and bring back some of the comforts of request.

scripts.npm:version:patch: npm version patch && git add package.json && git push origin master --tags
scripts.npm:version:minor: npm version minor && git add package.json && git push origin master --tags
scripts.npm:version:major: npm version major && git add package.json && git push origin master --tags

author: CrypticSafe5
